snippet.title: Alvora Tactics Trailer
snippet.description:
Available DRM-free at http://www.alvoratactics.com/
Or on Steam at http://store.steampowered.com/app/643900/Alvora_Tactics/

Alvora Tactics is an indie Tactics RPG that combines strategic combat with immersive exploration.
Explore and conquer Great Serpent Alvora with your own customizable band of warriors!
---

Music: Raid2 by PeriTune Material
